scripts.transpile-examples-js: mkdir -p examples/src/lib/mithril-infinite/ && cp lib/mithril-infinite.js examples/src/lib/mithril-infinite/ && cp lib/mithril-infinite.css examples/src/lib/mithril-infinite/ && babel examples/src/app/index/index.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/index/index.js && babel examples/src/app/images/images.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/images/images.js && babel examples/src/app/table/table.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/table/table.js && babel examples/src/app/short/short.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/short/short.js && babel examples/src/app/grid/grid.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/grid/grid.js && babel examples/src/app/horizontal/horizontal.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/horizontal/horizontal.js
scripts.transpile-examples: npm run transpile-examples-css && npm run transpile-examples-js
scripts.build-examples: npm run transpile-examples && node scripts/build-examples.js examples
scripts.watch-examples: npm run watch-examples-es6 & npm run watch-examples-css
scripts.watch-source: npm run watch-source-css & npm run watch-source-es6
scripts.watch: npm run watch-source & npm run watch-examples
scripts.github: rm -rf ../gh-pages/app && rm -rf ../gh-pages/*.html && rm -rf ../gh-pages/lib && rm -rf ../gh-pages/config.js && npm run build-examples && npm run copy-to-gh
